introduction: Tanya is no stranger to gun violence. She was referred to The Abuse Prevention Program (TAPP) at SCCC following her involvement in a shootout. Several months into the program, she discovered that inappropriate photos of herself had been posted online. Enraged, she grabbed a gun and sped off towards confrontation. Moments before making a tragic decision, she remembered the tools she learned in TAPP. Tanya identified her emotions, channeled her strength and put the gun down.
